title: Enhancing Practical Programming Competencies: Museum-Based Remote Science Learning Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and basic understanding of teaching and learning processes
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Explaining at least three science instructional design frameworks utilizing museum digital collections
Designing at least two activities that promote interaction between learners and museum resources in VR/simulation environments
Developing at least one assessment rubric for effective utilization of museum materials in remote science education
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
